name: The Mod Squad
overview:
The Mod Squad was the enormously successful groundbreaking "hippie" undercover cop show that ran on ABC from September 24, 1968, until August 23, 1973. It starred Michael Cole as Pete Cochren, Peggy Lipton as Julie Barnes, Clarence Williams III as Linc Hayes, and Tige Andrews as Captain Adam Greer. The executive producers of the series were Aaron Spelling and Danny Thomas.

The iconic counter-culture police series earned six Emmy nominations, four Golden Globe nominations plus one win for Peggy Lipton, one Directors Guild of America award, and four Logies. In 1997 the episode "Mother of Sorrow" was ranked #95 on TV Guide's 100 Greatest Episodes of All Time.

episodes.name: The Teeth of the Barracuda
episodes.overview: The daughter of a California governorial candidate is caught with drugs and is blackmailed.

episodes.name: Bad Man on Campus
episodes.overview: Pete, Linc and Julie work undercover in a high school to break up a juvenile car theft ring.

episodes.name: When Smitty Comes Marching Home
episodes.overview: A Vietnam veteran awakens on the beach beside the body of his Army nemesis. Linc helps his old friend figure things out.

episodes.name: You Can't Tell the Players Without a Programmer
episodes.overview: A computer dating agency sets up to find very wealthy women and send out a young stud to rip them off.

episodes.name: A Time to Love -- A Time to Cry
episodes.overview: After an LSD trip, photographer Robbie Larson wakes up beside the dead body of one of his models.

episodes.name: Find Tara Chapman!
episodes.overview: Unaware she has contagious meningitis, a singer who witnessed a mob murder flees the hospital.

episodes.name: The Price of Terror
episodes.overview: The squad searches for the assailant behind the attempts on Greer's life, leading to the kidnapping of Julie in exchange for Greer.

episodes.name: A Quiet Weekend in the Country
episodes.overview: An ex-convict tells Greer that drug pushers will be meeting at a rural trailer camp.

episodes.name: Love
episodes.overview: Pete's cousin Karen turns to kidnapping to gain her parents attention after they are distracted by the new baby.

episodes.name: Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Starlet
episodes.overview: This episode is one of the creepiest Mod Squad shows! The trio is planted in an acting community to find out who is killing the young starlet wannabes. Julie is staying at the same small apartment house where all the starlets are. Mrs. Petree who runs the place, and her very creepy son Norman (ugh very very disturbing portrayal). Norman has a habit of walking into the starlets rooms and sniffing their stockings and other unmentionables! The TV Host who is a perv and cant keep his clammy paws off of the starlets, and the abusive actor wannabe Timmy who thinks he is a Brando/Dean all are suspect, but dont count out the other characters.

episodes.name: The Guru
episodes.overview: Posing as hippies the trio investigate the bombing of an underground paper, resulting in murder.

episodes.name: The Sunday Drivers
episodes.overview: Linc is convinced that the death of his friend, Tommy Salido, a stunt-driver was not accidental. The trio investigates and uncover a drug smuggling operation.

episodes.name: Hello Mother, My Name Is Julie
Flight Five Doesn't Answer
episodes.overview: Mob assassins force a plane to crash, stranding Greer, Linc, and Pete and a government witness in the desert. All in search of five million dollars of missing mob money.

episodes.name: Fear Is the Bucking Horse
episodes.overview: Far West Acres is Western Rodeo where the squad is sent to protect former TV Cowboy star Billy Kilgore from a series of bizarre attacks against his life.

episodes.name: A Hint of Darkness, A Hint of Light
episodes.overview: Blind author Jenny Wills is viciously attacked on the beach by an unknown assailant, who makes repeated attempts on her life. Unbeknowst to her, he thinks she saw him commit a crime.

episodes.name: The Uptight Town
episodes.overview: A racist town tries to pin a murder on a black man who had nothing to do with it.

episodes.name: A Run for the Money
episodes.overview: Pete falls for Ginny, who believes her jailed father is innocent of robbery.

episodes.name: Child of Sorrow, Child of Light
episodes.overview: Julie poses as an unwed mother to infiltrate an extortion racket that blackmails parents of adopted babies.

episodes.name: Keep the Faith, Baby
episodes.overview: A murderer stalks the suspended priest who heard his confession.

episodes.name: Captain Greer, Call Surgery
episodes.overview: Greer thinks a series of hospital drug robberies are inside jobs. The trio poses as hospital staff to solve this case.

episodes.name: Peace Now -- Arly Blau
episodes.overview: Linc and Pete go undercover as prison inmates to protect the life of a convicted draft dodger, whose father is a General in the Vietnam War.

episodes.name: A Seat by the Window
episodes.overview: The trio splits up onto three tour buses to find the killer of a man found at a bus station.

episodes.name: The Girl in Chair Nine
episodes.overview: A clairvoyant's prediction about a missing college student leads to an illegal abortion ring.

episodes.name: My Name Is Manolette
episodes.overview: Thieves send a little boy to do the stealing and reap the rewards. Manolette runs away and the trio help him find a new home.

episodes.name: An Eye for an Eye
episodes.overview: A narcotics gang kidnaps Greer's girlfriend, widow of an FBI agent. In trade they want squealer Crowley who is testifying against them.

episodes.name: Ride the Man Down
episodes.overview: Pete tries to help a young woman and winds up the chief suspect in a murder. The team sets out to clear Pete of an obvious frame-up.

episodes.name: To Linc -- with Love
episodes.overview: Linc's new love is evasive and secretive about her past which places a strain on their budding relationship.

episodes.name: Lisa
episodes.overview: The squad is unaware that the writer they are assigned to protect, has a split personality.

episodes.name: Willie Poor Boy
episodes.overview: An illerate small time crook gets caught when he can't read the sign warning of danger. The squad rallies to help him if he cooperates with the law and snitches on his partner, who is responsible for the death of the security guard.

episodes.name: The Death of Bill Hannachek
episodes.overview: Julie poses as a singer at a Country Western bar to find out the real reason behind Wild Bill Hannachek's death.

episodes.name: A Place to Run, A Heart to Hide In
In This Corner -- Sol Albert
episodes.overview: Tenants revolt against a racist slum lord and threaten the wrong person. Trio confronts the slum lord to no avail, until interventions from the Rabbi Tannenbaum convince him otherwise.

episodes.name: Never Give the Fuzz an Even Break
episodes.overview: Con artist Admiral Nathaniel Johnson takes on the trio and teaches them the art of the con. They comply and become enamored of the Admirals ways and realize too late they are being conned themselves.

episodes.name: Sweet Child of Terror
episodes.overview: Disturbed handyman kidnaps the daughter of his employer, believes that Julie is the daughter. Ends in a showdown.

episodes.name: A Time for Remembering
episodes.overview: Beau Graves is released from prison after the trio put him there two years ago. Pete is trying to decide whether or not to quit the trio and work for his dad. Flashbacks to previous episodes after Linc is shot make it clear to everyone the importance of their ""family"".

episodes.name: Return to Darkness, Return to Light
Who Are the Keepers, Who Are the Inmates?
Welcome to the Human Race, Levi Frazee!
A Far Away Place So Near
Is There Anyone Left Is Santa Paula?
Is That Justice? No, It's Law
Color of Laughter, Color of Tears
And a Little Child Shall Bleed Them
Feet of Clay
episodes.overview: Linc befriends a deaf-mite who becomes a reluctant hero after saving a guard's life in a warehouse fire.

episodes.name: No More Oak Leaves for Ernie Holland
The Thunder Makers
episodes.overview: The Squad investigates when a youth joins a motorcycle gang, plots a fake payroll robbery of his father's company and learns the other gang members are playing it for real.

episodes.name: Can You Hear Me Out There?
Belinda -- End of Little Miss Bubble Gum
Put Out the Welcome Mat for Death
